title: The Nate Duran Memorial Scholarship Fund
description: The Nate Duran Memorial Scholarship will benefit undergraduate CU Boulder students enrolled in the Journalism Department (College of Media, Communication and Information), who suffer from arachnoiditis or other medical disabilities
marketingContent: The Nate Duran Memorial Scholarship will benefit undergraduate CU Boulder students enrolled in the Journalism Department (College of Media, Communication and Information), who suffer from arachnoiditis or other medical disabilities.
